Traits.Name: Tar Drip
Traits.Content: The Asphalt Crawler emits a continuous dripping of tar that creates difficult terrain in a 10-foot radius around it.

Traits.Name: Pavement Camouflage
Traits.Content: The Asphalt Crawler has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in urban environments or areas with asphalt.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Asphalt Crawler makes three attacks: two with its Tar Slam and one with its Asphalt Lash.

Actions.Name: Tar Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone as the tar-laden limbs of the Asphalt Crawler slam into them.

Actions.Name: Asphalt Lash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage. On a hit, the target must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one, as the Asphalt Crawlerâ€™s lash drips with corrosive tar.

Actions.Name: Sticky Grasp
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or become restrained by a thick layer of tar for 1 minute. The restrained target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, freeing itself on a success.
